articles.author: From NBA.com News Services
articles.title: Fever rookie Caitlin Clark breaks WNBA's single-season assists record - NBA.com
articles.description: Indiana Fever phenom Caitlin Clark broke the WNBA's single-season assist record Friday night with her 317th dime of her rookie season.
articles.content:
Two months after breaking the WNBA record for most assists in a game, Caitlin Clark has now set the record for most assists in a season.
Indiana Fever phenom Caitlin Clark keeps rewriting the WNBA r… [+1288 chars]
